DRINKS.name: Trinidad Sour
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Alexander
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.

DRINKS.name: Americano
DRINKS.directions: Mix the ingredients directly in an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of Soda Water. Stir gently.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with half orange slice and a lemon zest.

DRINKS.name: Angel Face
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Aviation
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Barracuda
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the Prosecco, shake well with ice, strain into chilled highball glass filled with ice and top up with Prosecco.
DRINKS.garnish: Pineapple and Cherry, optional mint sprig for additional aroma.

DRINKS.name: Bee's Knees
DRINKS.directions: Stir honey with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Optionally garnish with a lemon or orange zest.

DRINKS.name: Bellini
DRINKS.directions: Pour peach puree into the mixing glass with ice, add the Prosecco wine. Stir gently and pour in a chilled flute glass.

DRINKS.name: Between the Sheets
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Black Russian
DRINKS.directions: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

DRINKS.name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: Tabasco, Celery Salt, Pepper (Up to taste)
DRINKS.directions: Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into rocks glass.

DRINKS.name: Boulevardier
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with orange zest, optionally a lemon zest.

DRINKS.name: Bramble
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish optionally with a lemon slice and blackberries.

DRINKS.name: Brandy Crusta
DRINKS.directions: Mix together all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into prepared slim cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Rub a slice of orange (or lemon) around the rim of the glass and dip it in pulverized white sugar, so that the sugar will adhere to the edge of the glass. Carefully curling place the orange/lemon peel around the inside of the glass.

DRINKS.name: Canchanchara
DRINKS.directions: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

DRINKS.name: Caipirinha
DRINKS.directions: Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

DRINKS.name: Casino
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled rocks glass with ice.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with lemon zest and a maraschino cherry.

DRINKS.name: Champagne Cocktail
DRINKS.directions: Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac. Pour gently chilled Champagne.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

DRINKS.name: Clover Club
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Corpse Reviver #2
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain in chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Cosmopolitan
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Cuba Libre
DRINKS.directions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

DRINKS.name: Daiquiri
DRINKS.directions: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Dark 'n' stormy
DRINKS.directions: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a lime wedge or slice.

DRINKS.name: Dry Martini
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with green olives if requested.

DRINKS.name: Espresso Martini
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Fernandito
DRINKS.directions: Pour the Fernet Branca into a double old fashioned glass with ice, fill the glass up with Cola. Gently stir.

DRINKS.name: French 75
DRINKS.directions: Pour all the ingredients, except Champagne, into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

DRINKS.name: French Connection
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

DRINKS.name: French Martini
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

DRINKS.name: Gin Fizz
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients with ice except soda water. Pour into thin tall Tumbler glass , top with a splash soda water.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a lemon slice, optional lemon zest.

DRINKS.name: Golden Dream
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Grasshopper
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.

DRINKS.name: Hanky Panky
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Hemingway Special
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Horse's Neck
DRINKS.directions: Pour Cognac and ginger ale directly into a highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a rind of one lemon spiral.

DRINKS.name: Illegal
ingredients: ½ ounce Jamaica Overproof White Rum
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or “on the rocks” in a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

DRINKS.name: Irish Coffee
DRINKS.directions: Warm black coffee is poured into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass. Whiskey and at least one teaspoon of sugar is added and stirred until dissolved. Fresh thick chilled cream is carefully poured over the back of a spoon held just above the surface of the coffee. The layer of cream will float on the coffee without mixing. Plain sugar can be replaced with sugar syrup

DRINKS.name: John Collins
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients directly into a highball filled with ice. Stir gently.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry.

DRINKS.name: KIR
DRINKS.directions: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.

DRINKS.name: Last word
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Lemon drop Martini
ingredients: 1 ounce Vodka Citron 20 ml Triple Sec 15 ml Fresh Lemon Juice
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.

DRINKS.name: Long Island Ice Tea
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice.

DRINKS.name: Mai-Tai
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves, and lime peel.

DRINKS.name: Manhattan
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Margarita
ingredients: ½ ounce Freshly Squeezed Lime Juice
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.

DRINKS.name: Martinez
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Mary Pickford
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Mimosa
DRINKS.directions: Pour orange juice into a flute glass and gently pour the sparkling wine. Stir gently.

DRINKS.name: Mint Julep
DRINKS.directions: In Julep Stainless Steel Cup gently muddle the mint with sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add the Bourbon and stir well until the cup frosts.

DRINKS.name: Mojito
DRINKS.directions: Mix mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Light stir to involve all ingredients.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with sprigs of mint and slice of lime.

DRINKS.name: Monkey Gland
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Moscow Mule
DRINKS.directions: In a Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.

DRINKS.name: Naked and Famous
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Negroni
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients directly into a chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice, Stir gently.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice.

DRINKS.name: New York Sour
ingredients: ½ ounce Red wine (Shiraz or Malbech)
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with lemon or orange zest with cherry.

DRINKS.name: Old Cuban
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine.

DRINKS.name: Old Fashioned
DRINKS.directions: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Stir gently.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with an orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

DRINKS.name: Paloma
DRINKS.directions: Poor the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a slice of lime.

DRINKS.name: Paper Plane
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Paradise
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Penicillin
DRINKS.directions: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Islay single malt whiskey. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. Float the single malt whisky on top.

DRINKS.name: Pina Colada
DRINKS.directions: Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large glass, and serve with straws.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

DRINKS.name: Pisco Sour
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
DRINKS.garnish: Few dashes of Amargo bitters on top as an aromatic garnish.

DRINKS.name: Planter's Punch
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.

DRINKS.name: Porto Flip
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Ramos Fizz
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients except soda water in a cocktail shaker with ice, Shake for two minutes, double strain in a glass, pour the drink back in the shaker, and hard shake without ice for one minute. Strain into a highball glass, top up with soda.

DRINKS.name: Russian Spring Punch
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice, and top up with sparkling wine.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with blackberries and optionally a lemon slice as well.

DRINKS.name: Rusty Nail
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

DRINKS.name: Sazerac
DRINKS.directions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice in a mixing glass. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, strain the mixed drink into the glass.

DRINKS.name: Sea Breeze
DRINKS.directions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and cherry

DRINKS.name: Sex on the Beach
DRINKS.directions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice.

DRINKS.name: Sidecar
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Singapore Sling
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Hurricane glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry

DRINKS.name: Southside
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Spicy Fifty
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a red chili pepper

DRINKS.name: Spritz
DRINKS.directions: Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

DRINKS.name: Stinger
ingredients: ¾ ounce White Crème de Menthe
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Suffering Bastard
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the ginger beer, shake well with ice, Pour unstrained into a Collins glass or in the original S. Bastard mug and top up with ginger beer.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with mint springs and optionally an orange slice as well.

DRINKS.name: Tequila Sunrise
DRINKS.directions: Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with half orange slice or an orange zest

DRINKS.name: Tipperary
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

DRINKS.name: Tommy's Margarita
ingredients: 1 ounce Agave Syrup (1/2 Water + 1/2 Agave Nectar)
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.

DRINKS.name: Tuxedo
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with cherry and lemon zest

DRINKS.name: VE.N.TO
ingredients: ½ ounce Honey mix (replace water with chamomile)*
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with lemon zest and white grapes.

DRINKS.name: Vesper
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Vieux Carrè
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

DRINKS.name: Whiskey Sour
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cobbler glass. If served “On the rocks”, strain ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice and maraschino cherry, optionally use orange zest.

DRINKS.name: White Lady
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Yellow Bird
DRINKS.directions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

DRINKS.name: Zombie
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients into an electric blender with 170 grams of cracked ice. With pulse bottom blend for a few seconds. Serve in a tall tumbler glass. Note: Donn's Mix: 2 parts of fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part of cinnamon syrup.
